name: Chaos at the Cathedral
description:
You have woken up at a renovated cathedral, the place seems deserted, until you realize that you may have just become the hostage. Escape, or die trying. 



Features
  • Highly Interactive environment
  • Journal, items, inventory
  • Optimization options for lower-spec computers

    ***Tested only on windows 64 bit***
    Made with Unreal Engine 5.1
